channel.title: How to turn on drops
channel.description: Hi I recently got 100 players and I wanna have a drop party and i dont know how to turn on the drops. please help.

item.title: How to turn on drops
item.dc:creator: @Diamond_Pk Diamond Pk
item.description:
@Diamond_Pk wrote:

There is only the command resetdrops. Which resets all npc drops, not player drops.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 14, 2009, 01:07:56 pm[/size][hr]Bumb…

Read full topic

@lesterknome wrote:

Diamond Pk:

I MADE IT MYSELF AND I TURNED DROP OFF (LIKE DISPEARRING WHEN YOU DROP) UNTIL 100 PLAYERS. AND I NOW HAVE 100 PLAYERS AND I WANNA MAKE ITEMS APPEAR.

Ok show us what this code you made is, and also press the key to the left of ‘A’, you don’t need Caps Lock on.

item.title: How to turn on drops
item.dc:creator: @lesterknome lesterknome
item.description:
@lesterknome wrote:

[quote=“jamessemple, post:8, topic:314106”][quote author=lesterknome link=topic=410580.msg3028809#msg3028809 date=1258222412]

here try this:

if (command.startsWith("dropparty") && (playerRights > 1)) { // command // made // by // -Mod James for (int x = 2608; x > 2603; x--) { for (int y = 3099; y > 3083; y--) { try { int itemid = misc.random(5000); ItemHandler.addItem(itemid - 1, x, y, 1, playerId, false); Thread.sleep(10); } catch (Exception e) { } } } }

That thread.sleep probably isn’t a good idea; you should find a different way to make it pause
[/quote]
not really… i find it effective[/quote]

Well it’s not. The thread reading the command will freeze every 10 milliseconds making the server very laggy. Unless you make this command it’s own thread, it’s not a good idea. Besides 10 milliseconds is nothing, so it wont help AT ALL.

Read full topic

item.title: How to turn on drops
item.dc:creator: @lesterknome lesterknome
item.description:
@lesterknome wrote:

Alrighty, you can either
(A. make a command that spawns all these items once time at a certain time
(B. make a command that let’s you spawn any item, any time

Tell me which one you want and ill show you how to make the command

Read full topic
